meta_description: "Upgrade your bathroom with this 60in. vanity set featuring a 1.18in. thick marble top and 3 soft close drawers. Includes sink and cabinet with 2 shelves and 2 doors. Traditional design with wood material and finished back. No assembly required. Manufacturer warranty included. Made in China."
meta_title: "Brookfield 60" Single Basin Vanity Set with Wood Cabinet and Carrara Marble Top"
details:
Includes Carrara Marble Top (may not be pictured in main image)

The Brookfield 60" single vanity by James Martin Vanities features hand carved accenting filigrees and raised panel doors. Two doors, on either side, open to shelves for storage below and three center drawers, made up of a lower double-height drawer and both middle and top short-length standard drawers, offer additional storage space. The look is completed with Antique Brass finish door and drawer pulls. Matching decorative wood backsplash is included.

Included Components:

  • Covered under James Martin Vanities' 1 year limited warranty
  • Wood vanity cabinet with 2 doors, 3 drawers and 2 shelves
  • Marble vanity top with 1 basin rectangular porcelain sink and matching backsplash
  • Faucet is not included and must be purchased separately

Cabinet Features:

  • Vanity cabinet is made from quality white poplar and plywood
  • Two door cabinet with three drawers and two interior shelves
  • Cabinets are finished inside and out, with a premium undercoat finish for superior moisture and UV resistance
  • Solid kiln-dried grade A hardwood
  • Optional designer wood backsplash included with cabinet
  • Soft-close, undermount drawer glides and soft-close door hinges
  • Drawer bottoms are lined with our signature brushed aluminum laminate

Vanity Top Features:

  • 3cm eased edge marble top comes with white porcelain rectangular sink that ship separately and include mounting brackets for easy installation
  • Natural stone tops finished and sealed to prevent stains and water marks

Cabinet Specifications:

  • Cabinet Width: 58-1/8" (from left to right)
  • Cabinet Height: 32-5/8" (from top to bottom)
  • Cabinet Depth: 22-5/8" (from front to back)
  • Number of Doors: 2
  • Number of Drawers: 3
  • Number of Shelves: 2

Vanity Top Specifications:

  • Vanity Top Width: 60" (left edge to right edge)
  • Vanity Top Depth: 22-3/4" (front edge to back edge)
  • Number of Basins: 1
  • Sink Measurements: 16-1/2" L X 12" W X 8" H
  • Number of Faucet Holes: 3
  • Faucet Centers: 8" (distance between the installation holes for the faucet handles)
